description: Event published when a Choria Machine transitions between states
title: io.choria.machine.watcher.file.v1.state

id.description: Unique instance ID that produced the message

identity.description: The configured identity of the component hosting the machine

version.description: The version of the machine that received the transition

timestamp.description: The time the state was gathered, UTC timezone, unix format with nano seconds

machine.description: The name of the machine that received the transition

name.description: The name of the exec watcher

type.description: The type of watcher issuing the event

path.description: The path to the file being watched

previous_outcome.description: The outcome of the previous execution
